ygData.subject: Question on mob teleporting
ygData.msgSnippet: My experience in the top roost is that if there is a aviak standing on the outside plus one on the inside right platform, attacking the one outside will pull
ygData.messageBody:
My experience in the top roost is that if there is a aviak standing on the
outside plus one on the inside right platform, attacking the one outside
will pull the one on the inside right platform. I assumed that it would
take the three of us a long time to kill the avocet (I was highest level
character at 28 and the other 2 were melee types). I also assumed that the
lament would wear off before we killed the avocet. As a result, I assumed
the best way to ensure the aviak on the inside right platform (harrier in
this case) would not attack us during the middle of the fight was to
teleport to the ground. Didn't actually think of fighting it on the catwalk
leading down from the top roost.

Galtin of E'ci

> If you could kill them (avo) on the ground and you had lamented the
> roosting
> birds, why not just fight the avo on the deck (not in the room) or drag
> him
> to the first skinny catwalk going down? 20-20 hindsight.
>
>
